title: How did Dobby gain his freedom and Harry Potter’s part in it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Harry put one of his socks in Tom Riddle’s diary which he gave to Lucius. Lucius, of course, handed the book (with the sock inside) to Dobby. When a master gives an elf clothing of any sort, it declares them a FREE ELF.

This is answered by reading Chamber of Secrets. In order to free an Elf, its master must present it with clothes. Harry Potter put Tom Riddle's diary into one of his socks, and gave it to Lucius Malfoy. Malfoy tossed the sock aside, and Dobby caught it, effectively freeing him.
